item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, February 12, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump says US and Russia to start talks on Ukraine war ‘immediately’
2. US inflation unexpectedly increases to 3% in January
3. Saudi Arabia launches ferocious state media attack on Netanyahu
4. Return to pre-2014 Ukraine borders ‘unrealistic’, says US defence secretary
5. China’s tech stocks enter bull market after DeepSeek breakthrough
item.guid: FT Most Read: Wednesday, February 12, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
